docs.text: juftin-scripts # Helpful Python scripts by @juftin Installation # Using pipx pipx install juftin-scripts Using pip pip install juftin-scripts CLI Reference # juftin # Juftin's CLI 🚀 This Command Line utility has a few tools for developer productivity and entertainment. Among its useful commands include browse for a GUI file browser and rotate - a tool for altering AWS profiles. Usage: juftin [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]... Options: --version Show the version and exit. --debug / --no-debug Enable extra debugging output --help Show this message and exit. juftin browse # Start the TUI File Browser This utility displays a TUI (textual user interface) application. The application allows you to visually browse through a repository and display the contents of its files Usage: juftin browse [OPTIONS] PATH Options: --debug / --no-debug Enable extra debugging output --help Show this message and exit. juftin rotate # Rotate a listed AWS Profile to your default profile This command line utility overwrites your default AWS Profile locally and replaces it with another profile. Usage: juftin rotate [OPTIONS] [PROFILE] Options: -l, --list List Available Profiles --help Show this message and exit. browse # If you'd like to use the browse CLI to view parquet files, install it with the parquet extra: pipx install "juftin-scripts[parquet]" If you'd like to use the browse CLI to view files on remote filesystems like AWS S3 or Google Cloud Storage, install it with the fsspec extra. pipx install "juftin-scripts[fsspec]" To install all extras, use the all extra: pipx install "juftin-scripts[all]"
docs.title: juftin-scripts

docs.text: Using pipx pipx install juftin-scripts Using pip pip install juftin-scripts
docs.title: Installation
